014package org.microbean.construct.element;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
017import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
018
019import java.util.ArrayDeque;
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.EnumSet;
023import java.util.Iterator;
024import java.util.LinkedList;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.Map.Entry;
028import java.util.Objects;
029import java.util.Queue;
030import java.util.SequencedMap;
031import java.util.Set;
032
033import java.util.function.Predicate;
034
035import java.util.stream.Stream;
036
037import javax.lang.model.AnnotatedConstruct;
038
039import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror;
040import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationValue;
041import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
042import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
043import javax.lang.model.element.QualifiedNameable;
044import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
045import javax.lang.model.element.VariableElement;
046
047import javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType;
048import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
049
050import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableList;
051import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSequencedMap;
052import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSet;
053
054import static java.util.LinkedHashMap.newLinkedHashMap;
055
056import static java.util.HashSet.newHashSet;
057
058import static java.util.function.Function.identity;
059
060import static java.util.stream.Stream.concat;
061import static java.util.stream.Stream.empty;
062import static java.util.stream.Stream.iterate;
063
064import static javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind.ANNOTATION_TYPE;
065import static javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind.CLASS;
066
067import static javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind.DECLARED;
068
069import static javax.lang.model.util.ElementFilter.methodsIn;
070
071/**
072 * A utility class for working with annotations as represented by {@link AnnotationMirror}s, {@link ExecutableElement}s,
073 * and {@link AnnotationValue}s.
074 *
075 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
076 */
077public final class AnnotationMirrors {
078
079  private static final Set<ElementType> EMPTY_ELEMENT_TYPES = unmodifiableSet(EnumSet.noneOf(ElementType.class));
080
081  private static final SequencedMap<?, ?> EMPTY_MAP = unmodifiableSequencedMap(newLinkedHashMap(0));
082
083  private static final SameAnnotationValueVisitor sameAnnotationValueVisitor = new SameAnnotationValueVisitor();
084
085  private AnnotationMirrors() {
086    super();
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Returns a determinate, non-{@code null}, immutable {@link List} of {@link AnnotationMirror}s <dfn>present</dfn> on
091   * the supplied {@link Element}.
092   *
093   * <p>This method is a more capable, better-typed replacement of the {@link
094   * javax.lang.model.util.Elements#getAllAnnotationMirrors(Element)} method, and should be preferred.</p>
095   *
096   * @param e an {@link Element}; must not be {@code null}
097   *
098   * @return a determinate, non-{@code null}, immutable {@link List} of {@link AnnotationMirror}s <dfn>present</dfn> on
099   * the supplied {@link Element}
100   *
101   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code e} is {@code null}
102   *
103   * @see javax.lang.model.util.Elements#getAllAnnotationMirrors(Element)
104   */
105  public static final List<? extends AnnotationMirror> allAnnotationMirrors(Element e) {
106    final List<AnnotationMirror> allAnnotations = new LinkedList<>(e.getAnnotationMirrors());
107    WHILE_LOOP:
108    while (e.getKind() == CLASS && e instanceof TypeElement te) {
109      final TypeMirror sct = te.getSuperclass();
110      if (sct.getKind() != DECLARED) {
111        break;
112      }
113      e = ((DeclaredType)sct).asElement();
114      final List<? extends AnnotationMirror> superclassAnnotations = e.getAnnotationMirrors();
115      if (!superclassAnnotations.isEmpty()) {
116        int added = 0;
117        for (final AnnotationMirror superclassAnnotation : superclassAnnotations) {
118          if (inherited(superclassAnnotation)) {
119            for (final AnnotationMirror a : allAnnotations.subList(added, allAnnotations.size())) {
120              if (((QualifiedNameable)superclassAnnotation.getAnnotationType().asElement()).getQualifiedName().contentEquals(((QualifiedNameable)a.getAnnotationType().asElement()).getQualifiedName())) {
121                continue WHILE_LOOP;
122              }
123            }
124            // javac prepends superclass annotations, resulting in a strage order; we duplicate it
125            allAnnotations.addFirst(superclassAnnotation);
126            ++added;
127          }
128        }
129      }
130    }
131    return allAnnotations.isEmpty() ? List.of() : unmodifiableList(allAnnotations);
132  }
133
134  /**
135   * For the supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}, returns an immutable, determinate {@link Map} of {@link AnnotationValue}
136   * instances indexed by its {@link ExecutableElement}s to which they apply.
137   *
138   * <p>Each {@link ExecutableElement} represents an <a
139   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se25/html/jls-9.html#jls-9.6.1">annotation element</a> and meets the
140   * requirements of such an element.</p>
141   *
142   * <p>Each {@link AnnotationValue} represents the value of an annotation element and meets the requirements for
143   * annotation values.</p>
144   *
145   * <p>This method is a more capable, better-typed replacement of the {@link
146   * javax.lang.model.util.Elements#getElementValuesWithDefaults(AnnotationMirror)} method, and should be preferred.</p>
147   *
148   * @param a an {@link AnnotationMirror}; may be {@code null} in which case an empty, immutable, determinate {@link
149   * Map} will be returned
150   *
151   * @return an immutable, determinate {@link Map} of {@link AnnotationValue} instances indexed by {@link
152   * ExecutableElement}s
153   *
154   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se25/html/jls-9.html#jls-9.6.1 Java Language Specification, section
155   * 9.6.1
156   *
157   * @see javax.lang.model.util.Elements#getElementValuesWithDefaults(AnnotationMirror)
158   */
159  public static final SequencedMap<ExecutableElement, AnnotationValue> allAnnotationValues(final AnnotationMirror a) {
160    if (a == null) {
161      return emptySequencedMap();
162    }
163    final Collection<? extends ExecutableElement> elements = methodsIn(a.getAnnotationType().asElement().getEnclosedElements());
164    if (elements.isEmpty()) {
165      return emptySequencedMap();
166    }
167    final SequencedMap<ExecutableElement, AnnotationValue> m = newLinkedHashMap(elements.size());
168    final Map<? extends ExecutableElement, ? extends AnnotationValue> explicitValues = a.getElementValues();
169    for (final ExecutableElement ee : elements) {
170      // You're going to want to use getOrDefault() here. Go ahead and try but you'll run into typing issues.
171      m.put(ee, explicitValues.containsKey(ee) ? explicitValues.get(ee) : ee.getDefaultValue());
172    }
173    return m.isEmpty() ? emptySequencedMap() : unmodifiableSequencedMap(m);
174  }
175
176  /**
177   * Returns the (determinate) {@link AnnotationMirror} <em>directly present</em> on the supplied {@link
178   * AnnotatedConstruct} whose {@linkplain AnnotationMirror#getAnnotationType() annotation type}'s {@link
179   * javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType#asElement() TypeElement} {@linkplain TypeElement#getQualifiedName() bears} the
180   * supplied {@code fullyQualifiedName}, or {@code null} if no such {@link AnnotationMirror} exists.
181   *
182   * @param ac an {@link AnnotatedConstruct}; must not be {@code null}
183   *
184   * @param name a {@link CharSequence}; may be {@code null} in which case {@code null} will be returned
185   *
186   * @return an {@link AnnotationMirror}, or {@code null}
187   *
188   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code ac} is {@code null}
189   *
190   * @see #streamBreadthFirst(AnnotatedConstruct)
191   *
192   * @see #streamDepthFirst(AnnotatedConstruct)
193   *
194   * @see AnnotationMirror#getAnnotationType()
195   *
196   * @see javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType#asElement()
197   *
198   * @see TypeElement#getQualifiedName()
199   *
200   * @see javax.lang.model.element.Name#contentEquals(CharSequence)
201   */
202  public static final AnnotationMirror get(final AnnotatedConstruct ac, final CharSequence name) {
203    if (name == null) {
204      return null;
205    }
206    for (final AnnotationMirror am : ac.getAnnotationMirrors()) {
207      final TypeElement e = (TypeElement)am.getAnnotationType().asElement();
208      if (e.getQualifiedName().contentEquals(name)) {
209        return am;
210      }
211    }
212    return null;
213  }
214
215  /**
216   * A convenience method that returns a value for an annotation element named by the supplied {@link CharSequence} and
217   * logically owned by the supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}, or {@code null} if no such value exists.
218   *
219   * @param am an {@link AnnotationMirror}; must not be {@code null}
220   *
221   * @param name a {@link CharSequence}; may be {@code null} in which case {@code null} will be returned
222   *
223   * @return the result of invoking {@link AnnotationValue#getValue() getValue()} on an {@link AnnotationValue}, or
224   * {@code null}
225   *
226   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code am} is {@code null}
227   *
228   * @see AnnotationValue
229   *
230   * @see #allAnnotationValues(AnnotationMirror)
231   */
232  public static final Object get(final AnnotationMirror am, final CharSequence name) {
233    if (name == null) {
234      return null;
235    }
236    for (final Entry<? extends Element, ? extends AnnotationValue> e : allAnnotationValues(am).entrySet()) {
237      if (e.getKey().getSimpleName().contentEquals(name)) {
238        final AnnotationValue av = e.getValue();
239        return av == null ? null : av.getValue();
240      }
241    }
242    return null;
243  }
244
245  /**
246   * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}'s {@linkplain
247   * AnnotationMirror#getAnnotationType() annotation type} is {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType#asElement()
248   * declared by} an element that has been (meta-) {@linkplain Element#getAnnotationMirrors() annotated} with {@link
249   * java.lang.annotation.Inherited}.
250   *
251   * @param a an {@link AnnotationMirror}; must not be {@code null}
252   *
253   * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}'s {@linkplain
254   * AnnotationMirror#getAnnotationType() annotation type} is {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType#asElement()
255   * declared by} an element that has been (meta-) {@linkplain Element#getAnnotationMirrors() annotated} with {@link
256   * java.lang.annotation.Inherited}
257   *
258   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code a} is {@code null}
259   *
260   * @see #inherited(TypeElement)
261   */
262  public static final boolean inherited(final AnnotationMirror a) {
263    return inherited((TypeElement)a.getAnnotationType().asElement());
264  }
265
266  /**
267   * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link TypeElement} represents an {@linkplain
268   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#ANNOTATION_TYPE annotation interface} and if it has been (meta-) annotated
269   * with {@link java.lang.annotation.Inherited}.
270   *
271   * @param annotationInterface a {@link TypeElement} representing an {@linkplain
272   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#ANNOTATION_TYPE annotation interface}; must not be {@code null}
273   *
274   * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link TypeElement} represents an {@linkplain
275   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#ANNOTATION_TYPE annotation interface} and if it has been (meta-) annotated
276   * with {@link java.lang.annotation.Inherited}
277   *
278   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code annotationInterface} is {@code null}
279   *
280   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se25/html/jls-9.html#jls-9.6.4.3 Java Language Specification,
281   * section 9.6.4.3
282   */
283  public static final boolean inherited(final TypeElement annotationInterface) {
284    if (annotationInterface.getKind() == ANNOTATION_TYPE) {
285      for (final AnnotationMirror ma : annotationInterface.getAnnotationMirrors()) {
286        if (((QualifiedNameable)ma.getAnnotationType().asElement()).getQualifiedName().contentEquals("java.lang.annotation.Inherited")) {
287          return true;
288        }
289      }
290    }
291    return false;
292  }
293
294  /**
295   * Returns a {@link RetentionPolicy} for the supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}, or {@link RetentionPolicy#CLASS} if,
296   * for any reason, a retention policy cannot be found or computed.
297   *
298   * @param a an {@link AnnotationMirror}; must not be {@code null}
299   *
300   * @return the {@link RetentionPolicy} for the supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}; never {@code null}
301   *
302   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code a} is {@code null}
303   *
304   * @see #retentionPolicy(TypeElement)
305   */
306  public static final RetentionPolicy retentionPolicy(final AnnotationMirror a) {
307    return retentionPolicy((TypeElement)a.getAnnotationType().asElement());
308  }
309
310  /**
311   * Returns a {@link RetentionPolicy} for the supplied {@link TypeElement} representing an {@linkplain
312   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#ANNOTATION_TYPE annotation interface}, or {@link RetentionPolicy#CLASS} if,
313   * for any reason, a retention policy cannot be found or computed.
314   *
315   * @param annotationInterface a {@link TypeElement}; must be non-{@code null} and should represent an {@linkplain
316   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#ANNOTATION_TYPE annotation interface}
317   *
318   * @return the {@link RetentionPolicy} for the supplied {@link TypeElement}; never {@code null}
319   *
320   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code annotationInterface} is {@code null}
321   *
322   * @see RetentionPolicy
323   *
324   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se25/html/jls-9.html#jls-9.6.4.2 Java Language Specification,
325   * section 9.6.4.2
326   */
327  public static final RetentionPolicy retentionPolicy(final TypeElement annotationInterface) {
328    if (annotationInterface.getKind() == ANNOTATION_TYPE) {
329      for (final AnnotationMirror ma : annotationInterface.getAnnotationMirrors()) {
330        if (((QualifiedNameable)ma.getAnnotationType().asElement()).getQualifiedName().contentEquals("java.lang.annotation.Retention")) {
331          return RetentionPolicy.valueOf(((VariableElement)get(ma, "value")).getSimpleName().toString());
332        }
333      }
334    }
335    return RetentionPolicy.CLASS;
336  }
337
338  /**
339   * Determines whether the two {@link AnnotationMirror}s represent the same (otherwise opaque) annotation.
340   *
341   * @param am0 an {@link AnnotationMirror}; may be {@code null}
342   *
343   * @param am1 an {@link AnnotationMirror}; may be {@code null}
344   *
345   * @return {@code true} if the supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}s represent the same (otherwise opaque) annotation;
346   * {@code false} otherwise
347   *
348   * @see #sameAnnotation(AnnotationMirror, AnnotationMirror)
349   */
350  public static final boolean sameAnnotation(final AnnotationMirror am0, final AnnotationMirror am1) {
351    return sameAnnotation(am0, am1, x -> true);
352  }
353
354  /**
355   * Determines whether the two {@link AnnotationMirror}s represent the same (underlying, otherwise opaque) annotation.
356   *
357   * @param am0 an {@link AnnotationMirror}; may be {@code null}
358   *
359   * @param am1 an {@link AnnotationMirror}; may be {@code null}
360   *
361   * @param p a {@link Predicate} that returns {@code true} if a given {@link ExecutableElement}, representing an
362   * annotation element, is to be included in the computation; may be {@code null} in which case it is as if
363   * {@code ()-> true} were supplied instead
364   *
365   * @return {@code true} if the supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}s represent the same (underlying, otherwise opaque)
366   * annotation; {@code false} otherwise
367   *
368   * @see SameAnnotationValueVisitor
369   *
370   * @see #allAnnotationValues(AnnotationMirror)
371   */
372  public static final boolean sameAnnotation(final AnnotationMirror am0,
373                                             final AnnotationMirror am1,
374                                             Predicate<? super ExecutableElement> p) {
375    if (am0 == am1) {
376      return true;
377    } else if (am0 == null || am1 == null) {
378      return false;
379    }
380    if (p == null) {
381      p = x -> true;
382    }
383    final QualifiedNameable qn0 = (QualifiedNameable)am0.getAnnotationType().asElement();
384    final QualifiedNameable qn1 = (QualifiedNameable)am1.getAnnotationType().asElement();
385    if (qn0 != qn1 && !qn0.getQualifiedName().contentEquals(qn1.getQualifiedName())) {
386      return false;
387    }
388    final SequencedMap<ExecutableElement, AnnotationValue> m0 = allAnnotationValues(am0);
389    final SequencedMap<ExecutableElement, AnnotationValue> m1 = allAnnotationValues(am1);
390    if (m0.size() != m1.size()) {
391      return false;
392    }
393    final Iterator<Entry<ExecutableElement, AnnotationValue>> i0 = m0.entrySet().iterator();
394    final Iterator<Entry<ExecutableElement, AnnotationValue>> i1 = m1.entrySet().iterator();
395    while (i0.hasNext()) {
396      final Entry<ExecutableElement, AnnotationValue> e0 = i0.next();
397      final Entry<ExecutableElement, AnnotationValue> e1 = i1.next();
398      final ExecutableElement ee0 = e0.getKey();
399      if (p.test(ee0) &&
400          (!e0.getKey().getSimpleName().contentEquals(e1.getKey().getSimpleName()) ||
401           !sameAnnotationValueVisitor.visit(e0.getValue(), e1.getValue().getValue()))) {
402        return false;
403      }
404    }
405    return !i1.hasNext();
406  }
407
408  /**
409   * Returns a non-{@code null}, sequential, non-empty {@link Stream} that traverses the supplied {@link
410   * AnnotationMirror}'s {@linkplain AnnotationMirror#getAnnotationType() annotation interface}'s {@link TypeElement}'s
411   * {@linkplain AnnotatedConstruct#getAnnotationMirrors() annotations}, and their (meta-) annotations, in breadth-first
412   * order.
413   *
414   * <p>The first and possibly only element in the {@link Stream} that is returned is guaranteed to be the supplied
415   * {@link AnnotationMirror}.</p>
416   *
417   * @param am an {@link AnnotationMirror}; must not be {@code null}
418   *
419   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link Stream} of {@link AnnotationMirror}s
420   *
421   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code am} is {@code null}
422   *
423   * @see #streamBreadthFirst(AnnotatedConstruct)
424   */
425  public static final Stream<AnnotationMirror> streamBreadthFirst(final AnnotationMirror am) {
426    return concat(Stream.of(am), streamBreadthFirst(am.getAnnotationType().asElement()));
427  }
428
429  /**
430   * Returns a non-{@code null}, sequential, {@link Stream} that traverses the supplied {@link AnnotatedConstruct}'s
431   * {@linkplain AnnotatedConstruct#getAnnotationMirrors() annotations}, and their (meta-) annotations, in breadth-first
432   * order.
433   *
434   * @param ac an {@link AnnotatedConstruct}; must not be {@code null}
435   *
436   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link Stream} of {@link AnnotationMirror}s
437   *
438   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code ac} is {@code null}
439   */
440  public static final Stream<AnnotationMirror> streamBreadthFirst(final AnnotatedConstruct ac) {
441    final List<? extends AnnotationMirror> ams = ac.getAnnotationMirrors();
442    final Set<String> names = newHashSet(ams.size());
443    final Queue<AnnotationMirror> q = new ArrayDeque<>();
444    ams.forEach(a -> {
445        names.add(((QualifiedNameable)a.getAnnotationType().asElement()).getQualifiedName().toString());
446        q.add(a);
447      });
448    return
449      iterate(q.poll(),
450              Objects::nonNull,
451              a0 -> {
452                a0.getAnnotationType()
453                  .asElement()
454                  .getAnnotationMirrors()
455                  .stream()
456                  .filter(a1 -> names.add(((QualifiedNameable)a1.getAnnotationType().asElement()).getQualifiedName().toString()))
457                  .forEach(q::add);
458                return q.poll();
459              });
460  }
461
462  /**
463   * A convenience method that returns a non-{@code null}, sequential, non-empty {@link Stream} that traverses the
464   * supplied {@link AnnotationMirror}'s {@linkplain AnnotationMirror#getAnnotationType() annotation interface}'s {@link
465   * TypeElement}'s {@linkplain AnnotatedConstruct#getAnnotationMirrors() annotations}, and their (meta-) annotations,
466   * in depth-first order.
467   *
468   * <p>The first and possibly only element in the {@link Stream} that is returned is guaranteed to be the supplied
469   * {@link AnnotationMirror}.</p>
470   *
471   * @param am an {@link AnnotationMirror}; must not be {@code null}
472   *
473   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link Stream} of {@link AnnotationMirror}s
474   *
475   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code am} is {@code null}
476   *
477   * @see #streamDepthFirst(AnnotatedConstruct)
478   */
479  // (Convenience.)
480  public static final Stream<AnnotationMirror> streamDepthFirst(final AnnotationMirror am) {
481    return concat(Stream.of(am), streamDepthFirst(am.getAnnotationType().asElement()));
482  }
483
484  /**
485   * Returns a non-{@code null}, sequential {@link Stream} that traverses the supplied {@link AnnotatedConstruct}'s
486   * {@linkplain AnnotatedConstruct#getAnnotationMirrors() annotations}, and their (meta-) annotations, in depth-first
487   * order.
488   *
489   * @param ac an {@link AnnotatedConstruct}; must not be {@code null}
490   *
491   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link Stream} of {@link AnnotationMirror}s
492   *
493   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code ac} is {@code null}
494   */
495  public static final Stream<AnnotationMirror> streamDepthFirst(final AnnotatedConstruct ac) {
496    return streamDepthFirst(ac, newHashSet(17)); // 17 == arbitrary
497  }
498
499  /**
500   * Returns a non-{@code null}, determinate, immutable {@link Set} of {@link ElementType}s describing restrictions
501   * concerning where the annotation interface {@linkplain AnnotationMirror#getAnnotationType() represented} by the
502   * supplied {@link AnnotationMirror} may be applied.
503   *
504   * @param a an {@link AnnotationMirror}; must not be {@code null}
505   *
506   * @return a non-{@code null}, determinate, immutable {@link Set} of {@link ElementType}s describing restrictions
507   * concerning where the annotation interface {@linkplain AnnotationMirror#getAnnotationType() represented} by the
508   * supplied {@link AnnotationMirror} may be applied
509   */
510  public static final Set<ElementType> targetElementTypes(final AnnotationMirror a) {
511    return targetElementTypes((TypeElement)a.getAnnotationType().asElement());
512  }
513
514  /**
515   * Returns a non-{@code null}, determinate, immutable {@link Set} of {@link ElementType}s describing restrictions
516   * concerning where the supplied annotation interface may be applied.
517   *
518   * @param annotationInterface a {@link TypeElement} representing an {@linkplain
519   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#ANNOTATION_TYPE annotation interface}; must not be {@code null}
520   *
521   * @return a non-{@code null}, determinate, immutable {@link Set} of {@link ElementType}s describing restrictions
522   * concerning where the supplied annotation interface may be applied
523   *
524   * @see java.lang.annotation.ElementType
525   *
526   * @see java.lang.annotation.Target
527   *
528   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se25/html/jls-9.html#jls-9.6.4.1 Java Language Specification,
529   * section 9.6.4.1
530   */
531  public static final Set<ElementType> targetElementTypes(final TypeElement annotationInterface) {
532    if (annotationInterface.getKind() == ANNOTATION_TYPE) {
533      for (final AnnotationMirror ma : annotationInterface.getAnnotationMirrors()) {
534        if (((QualifiedNameable)ma.getAnnotationType().asElement()).getQualifiedName().contentEquals("java.lang.annotation.Target")) {
535          @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
536          final List<? extends AnnotationValue> elementTypes = (List<? extends AnnotationValue>)get(ma, "value");
537          if (elementTypes.isEmpty()) {
538            break;
539          }
540          final Set<ElementType> s = EnumSet.noneOf(ElementType.class);
541          for (final AnnotationValue av : elementTypes) {
542            s.add(ElementType.valueOf(((VariableElement)av.getValue()).getSimpleName().toString()));
543          }
544          return unmodifiableSet(s);
545        }
546      }
547    }
548    return EMPTY_ELEMENT_TYPES;
549  }
550
551  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
552  private static final <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V> emptySequencedMap() {
553    return (SequencedMap<K, V>)EMPTY_MAP;
554  }
555
556  private static final Stream<AnnotationMirror> streamDepthFirst(final AnnotatedConstruct ac,
557                                                                 final Set<String> names) {
558    // See https://www.techempower.com/blog/2016/10/19/efficient-multiple-stream-concatenation-in-java/
559    return
560      Stream.of(ac.getAnnotationMirrors()
561                .stream()
562                .flatMap(a -> {
563                    final TypeElement e = (TypeElement)a.getAnnotationType().asElement();
564                    return names.add(e.getQualifiedName().toString()) ? streamDepthFirst(e, names) : empty();
565                  }))
566      .flatMap(identity());
567  }
568
569}
